explanation: The loop that scans the upward-right diagonals started at range(5, h), which skips the row index 4 (0-based). To form a 5-letter upward diagonal you must allow starting rows with index 4 (so indices 4,3,2,1,0 are valid). This was an off-by-one error. I fixed that single line to range(4, h) so the code checks the diagonal beginning at row index 4 as well.
